name: eat kraken v2
description:
CONTROLS:

Main Control: mouse cursor
Move Between Screens: mouse over the side bars or A D or < >
Continue (dialogue): SPACE or ENTER
Escape (instructions, pause): ESC
Restart: R

Note: the game works best in 16:9 aspect ratio. Other ratios may cause some visual bugs.

INSTRUCTIONS:

- Look at your orders, hover over them for the full recipe! 
- Watch your customer's happiness or else they will get mad and leave.
- 3 failed orders (too slow or incorrect or burned) = you get FIRED.
- Cook the rice, use the KNIFE to chop the vegetables.
- Cut seafood from yourself using the BUTCHER KNIFE at the bottom, but watch your health! Lose all of your health = you DIE.
- Cook all ingredients that must be cooked (indicated by a FLAME on the order ticket: lotus, mushroom, scallop, squid).
- Assemble all the ingredients in the bowl starting with the rice.
- When your health is getting low, eat what you have made to survive using the CONSUME tentacle at the bottom!
- Finish an entire day's of work, and you WIN!
Good luck, but don't work too hard!

------------------------------------------------------------

TEAM:

Jade Wang - Programming + Level Design
Allison Chen  - Project Management + UI Design + Level Design
Erna Balayan - Background Artist + Animation + Audio Design
Veronica Qu - Asset Artist
Alex Du - Character Design + Cutscenes Artist
Edikan Abia - Audio Design
Kiara Blanz - Narrative Design

Major Studio Spring '22

------------------------------------------------------------

Eat Kraken V1 by Allison Chen, Hongke Luo, and Eris Li
